description: Presents tactical puzzles (forks, pins, skewers, sacrifices, checkmates), guides the user with progressive hints if wrong, explains the complete solution and tactical patterns involved, adjusts difficulty based on performance

example_response.puzzle_fen: FEN position of the tactical puzzle
example_response.side_to_move: Which side moves: white or black
example_response.difficulty: Puzzle difficulty: beginner, intermediate, advanced, or master
example_response.tactical_theme: The tactical theme of the puzzle
example_response.puzzle_prompt: The challenge prompt presented to the user
example_response.solution_explanation: Detailed explanation of the tactical pattern and solution
example_response.user_answer_feedback: Feedback on the user's attempted answer
example_response.pattern_lesson: Educational lesson about the tactical pattern for learning
example_response.next_action: What to do next: new_puzzle, retry, or show_solution
